QuestData.Title: Something Extra for the Winter Queen
QuestData.Description:
Ya did good wit' how ya handled Mueh'zala. Me be wantin' ta return da favor. We be friends, after all... riiiight?
Dat nasty loa be at me mercy now. Him been mutterin' about some tings he stole from ya Winter Queen.
Come along ta me Necropolis. Ya can see what Ol' Bwonsamdi be talkin' about for yaself.
Ya gonna come back with someting nice for her majesty... reeeeeal nice.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel with Bwonsamdi to the Necropolis in Nazmir.
QuestData.RewardText:
While ya be here, why not help clean up some of da trash outside me Necropolis? For old time's sake, eh?
Den we can be dealin' wit Mueh'zala.
